input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response A: Okay, I’ll be very direct here, because this is pretty tricky.  The “Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design” is a weather vane that is designed to be mounted on a pole in a garden.  It’s made of 14 gauge steel, and has sealed ball bearings to ensure smooth movement.  The color is antique copper.
input_text.Response B: This garden-mounted weathervane is a great way to decorate your lawn or garden and at the same time be functional. The weathervane is made of 14 gauge steel and has an antique copper finish. It comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. The sealed ball bearings in the wind cup ensure easy and fluid movement. This is a garden mount only.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
